Question: This person's vocals cross several musical genres.
Hints: This person earned his latest UK number one as of 2012[update] with the title track of his LP release that year, "Pipes of Peace".
MacDonald called this person's Mellotron intro on "Strawberry Fields Forever" an integral feature of the song's character.
They arrested this person and brought him to a local jail while the Japanese government decided what to do.
